Html: If I understand correctly, http://shadowpriest.com/viewtopic.php?f=47&t=23007 indicates that we have a soft cap for haste around 400, after which haste is worth less to our boss fight dps until 900.  Is it known whether Rawr.ShadowPriest can model this?  If this is true, I believe we would like to devalue haste after 400 in the gear comparisons.  I don't know how to accomplish it through the regular comparison screen (without relying on selecting certain pieces and evaluating through the optimizer with haste cap rules added).
ShadowPriest does account for this, you don't need to do anything.
